Layer.PlaySoundCommand: %function(self) local Pr = PROFILEMAN:GetMachineProfile():GetSaved() if Pr.DWIAnnouncer then AudioPlay('Internal/profile') end end

Layer.OnCommand:
%function(self) self:addy(80) self:zoom(0.6) self:shadowlength(1) self:sleep(0.01)
USBRemoved = false USBState = false
self:queuecommand('Update') end

Layer.TotalSongCheckCommand: %function(self) local Pr = PROFILEMAN:GetMachineProfile():GetSaved() if not Pr.DWITotalSongsPlayedP1 then self:settext('0') Pr.DWITotalSongsPlayedP1 = 0 PROFILEMAN:SaveMachineProfile() else self:settext( Pr.DWITotalSongsPlayedP1 ) end end

%function(self) local Pr = PROFILEMAN:GetMachineProfile():GetSaved() if not Pr.DWITotalStepsHitP1 then self:settext('0') Pr.DWITotalStepsHitP1 = 0 PROFILEMAN:SaveMachineProfile() else self:settext( Pr.DWITotalStepsHitP1 ) end end

Layer.CheckLabelCommand: %function(self) local Pr = PROFILEMAN:GetMachineProfile():GetSaved() if Pr.DWIHighestSessionScore then self:settext('Highest Session Score') else self:settext('Highest Score') end end

Layer.TotalSongCheckCommand: %function(self) local Pr = PROFILEMAN:GetMachineProfile():GetSaved() if not Pr.DWIHighestScoreP1 or not Pr.DWIHighestSessionScoreP1 then self:settext(' ') Pr.DWIHighestScoreP1 = 0 Pr.DWIHighestSessionScoreP1 = 0 PROFILEMAN:SaveMachineProfile() else if Pr.DWIHighestSessionScore then self:settext( string.format('% 9d', Pr.DWIHighestSessionScoreP1 ) ) else self:settext( string.format('% 9d', Pr.DWIHighestScoreP1 ) ) end end end
